original_text: Then the Lamb opened the fifth seal. I saw an altar where people offered gifts to God. I saw the souls of some of God's people under the altar. These people had died because they had believed God's message. They had continued to speak the true message about Jesus Christ. That is why people had killed them.
korean_text: 다섯째 인을 떼실 때에 내가 보니 하나님의 말씀과 그들이 가진 증거로 말미암아 죽임을 당한 영혼들이 제단 아래에 있어

sentences.original_text: Then the Lamb opened the fifth seal
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 어린 양이 다섯째 인을 열었습니다

sentences.original_text: where people offered gifts to God
I saw the souls of some of God's people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하나님의 백성 중 어떤 이들의 영혼을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: because they had believed God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 하나님의 메시지를 믿었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: the true message about Jesus Christ
That is why people had killed them
